The boundaries of Earth’s 26,556-year HU-1 time cycle, and humanity’s entrapment within HU-1 physical matter, will be temporarily Transcended. This Day of Transcendence marks the ﬁrst day of Earth’ s new dawn into the age of enlightenment and the opportunity to stop the Intruder Vis- itors’ intended destruction of the human race. The Interdimensional Resonant Tone of Transcendence Day is scheduled to occur between 12:00 PM of 1/1/2000 and 12:00 AM 1/2/2000, as Earth completes its first day of the new millennium. 202
